show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Unthinking Obedience To The Police State Well Prepared-For

title: Unthinking Obedience To The Police State Well Prepared-For
content:
The original daily recitation of the Pledge of Allegiance in American schools was accompanied by ‘the Bellamy Salute’… which was dropped during WWII because the Nazis started using it (they copied the United States’ tactics to instill national pride and obedience).
The Nazi salute and the indoctrination of children was the US’s idea first.
Thus, the same blind obedience given to those in uniforms is also given to actions commanded under the name of the American flag.
The country has been perfectly primed for the arrival of a dictator.
Bill Still talks about a perfidious act of the government which you should all be aware of.
Rudyard Kipling and the essence behind his poem, “The Gods Of The Copybook Headings”.
 The Feds are muscling in on local law enforcement.
Janet Yellen is now clearly lying to the American people.
Japan has at last overtaken the United States as the world’s biggest economy.
A very brief account of the circumstances surrounding the death of the first Ebola victim in the US The story of a dying man in Hong Kong who was refused a visa to travel home to the UK because he had no credit card to pay – only cash…
